bib.title: An Implementation of a System of Verb Relations in plWordNet 2.0
bib.author: Maziarz, Marek and Piasecki, Maciej and Szpakowicz, Stan
bib.abstract: Verbs usually make up 10-15% of the material in a wordnet. We have embarked on a project in which this proportion increases to a lexically more realistic 1/3. The development of plWordNet 2.0 has been geared toward building up the verb hierarchy very considerably. The scaffolding upon which this part of our wordnet will rest is a detailed system of semantic relations. The selection of relations is informed by the linguistic accounts of Polish lexical semantics, notably the derivational procedures. The paper presents the background
bib.booktitle: Proceedings of the 6th Global WordNet Conference
